Name: Fly Tales
About the game: Tale of the carefree flight of one of the aircraft testers. His life changes during this test and he falls into an endless timeline that tries to destroy and absorb him, but the plane turned out to be a very successful instance and now all that remains is to apply his skills! Welcome in Fly Tales which a casual game in which the player controls an aircraft and tries with all his might to maneuver past various obstacles, from air spiders and spiked earthen ledges to stone shifts in the earth's crust and flying bombs. As a pilot, your mission is to suvive as much as possible with your aircraft by collecting gold which is accumulating in the form of a special bonus, which is displayed on the screen and shows how much the player has managed to go. Game Features: - Modifiable world - Bonuses - The difficulty of the game increase as you spend more time in the game
